$WmMPID_双界カアラ,ch03_19_Karla_FF_Pair,Face|Is there a problem, King Michalis?
We are at a festival, yet one would
not know it from your expression...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|...Never mind my expression.$k$p$WmMPID_フレイヤ味方,ch03_19_Karla_FF_Pair,Face|...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_フレイヤ味方,ch03_19_Karla_FF_Pair,Face|Let us be free of this mortal and
his sour mood, Karla. Neither are
worthy of my attention.$k$p$nMPID_双界カアラ|But... *sigh*$k$p$Sbs150|
